page.title: 17FARMING
page.content: On the 26th of June we went to do a farm survey for our Domesday project. We went to Cowes farm, on a mini bus. We saw machinery like tractors, sprayers and potato spreaders.The lady who showed us around was called Mrs. Norris. She took us to the crop field. There were marrows runner beans and sweet corn. There were lO5 cows and 10 people are employed. There was one brown bull. There were also l3 tractors. The crops that are sold are milk, greens, hay and straw. Most of the crops are sown in Autumn.
